name: Drunk Walk Game
description:
The player is walking home after a night of partying and drinking, they have trouble walking without stumbling. 

To create this feeling, the control to move forward will randomly change to one of the arrow keys

the players goal is to reach their home as fast as they can. (timer is work in progress)

Collaborators:

Liam/DoryStudios

Ollie/tropicalfruitdrink

Michael/Michael_Irlandez
